DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the Pharmacokinetics (PK) and safety and tolerability of etanercept, 25 and 50 mg, administered as a single dose to healthy male Chinese subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Enbrel Drug Levels in Healthy Male Chinese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Chinese subjects, ages 18 to 45. BMI in the range of 18 to 30 kg/m2 and weight greater than or equal to 50 kg. Active tuberculosis (TB) or history of TB. Serious infection (associated with hospitalization and/or antibiotics) within 1 month before study drug administration. History of protein drug hypersensitivity.
